AppointmentAssignmentPolicy.name: AppointmentAssignmentPolicy
AppointmentAssignmentPolicy.description: Stores information about resource assignment rules.

FullName.description: The API name of the AppointmentAssignmentPolicy object.

Language.description: The language of the appointment assignment policy.

MasterLabel.description: The label for the appointment assignment policy.

PolicyApplicableDuration.description: The frequency at which the utilization of service resources is calculated. This field is available in API version 53.0 and later.

PolicyType.description: The type of appointment assignment policy.

UtilizationFactor.description: Specifies the count type for the resource utilization. This field is available in API version 53.0 and later.
